image_guidelines.text: Check if the image shows the exact scene or object described in the text. Look for any discrepancies in details, colors, or composition.
examples: If text says 'red car', verify the car is actually red
If text mentions 'crowded street', check the number of people

image_guidelines.text: Verify if the image quality and resolution are sufficient to support the claims made in the text. Low quality images may hide important details.
examples: Blurry images cannot verify fine details
Dark images may hide important elements

image_guidelines.text: Check if the image perspective and framing match the text description. Different angles can show or hide important elements.
examples: Wide shots may miss important details

image_guidelines.text: Verify if the image shows the complete context needed to validate the text claims. Missing context can lead to misinterpretation.
examples: Cropped images may hide important context
Images without location context may be misleading

image_guidelines.text: Check if the image contains any visual elements that contradict the text description. Look for inconsistencies in objects, people, or settings.
examples: Text mentions 'summer' but image shows snow
Text describes 'modern city' but shows historical buildings

image_guidelines.text: Verify if the image shows the correct time period or era mentioned in the text. Anachronistic elements can indicate false claims.
Check if the image shows the correct location or setting described in the text. Geographical or architectural inconsistencies can indicate false claims.
examples: Wrong architectural style for claimed location

image_guidelines.text: Verify if the image shows the correct weather conditions or lighting described in the text. Environmental inconsistencies can indicate false claims.
examples: Text mentions 'sunny day' but image shows rain
Text describes 'night scene' but image shows daylight
